backend/main.mo: Defines Motoko actor with types and CRUD-style functions for daily briefs, research items, portfolio snapshots, alert rules, profiles, and assets.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence record describing footer preview note addition and associated files, components, tests, and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping of frontend file paths to short textual summaries for reference or documentation.
frontend/DRAFT_PREVIEW.md: Guide explaining how to run a local preview build of the PulseBrief frontend without deployment.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables and base styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, theme provider, public and protected layouts, and app shell integration.
frontend/src/components/auth/PrototypeSi: Modal dialog for prototype email sign-in with validation and success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/brand/ClickableW: Clickable PulseBrief wordmark button that navigates to the home page.
frontend/src/components/brand/Wordmark.t: Image-based PulseBrief wordmark component with configurable size.
frontend/src/components/brief/YesterdayV: Card widget comparing today's and yesterday's brief metrics with directional indicators.
frontend/src/components/charts/ChartPlac: Placeholder card showing a mock chart area with title and description.
frontend/src/components/common/DemoState: UI badge indicating demo or sample preview mode.
frontend/src/components/common/ScorePill: Visual pill component displaying a score relative to a max with color-coded styling.
frontend/src/components/common/StandardS: Displays a labeled score with a tooltip and sanitized one-sentence explanation.
frontend/src/components/compliance/Discl: Renders a footer with an informational disclaimer and attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppNav.ts: Top navigation bar with route links, user display, and logout handling.
Wraps pages with navigation, main content area, and footer disclaimer.
frontend/src/components/layout/Protected: Redirects unauthenticated users to profile or shows sign-in dialog, otherwise renders children.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/AssetE: Form component for adding portfolio assets with validation and sign‑in enforcement.
frontend/src/components/states/EmptyStat: Displays an empty-state message with icon, description, and optional action.
frontend/src/components/states/LoadingSt: Shows skeleton placeholders for loading content sections.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to identity changes and invalidates dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, login/logout handling, and identity initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useRequirePrototypeSi: Utility hook that enforces prototype sign‑in and redirects with a toast message.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light/dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function merging Tailwind class names with clsx and twMerge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entrypoint setting up ReactQuery, identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AlertsRulesPage.tsx: Renders predefined alert rules with toggle controls and syncs them using alerts queries. Ensures rules exist, handles toggling, and displays descriptions and statuses.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with marketing content, navigation buttons, and feature highlights. Directs users to view the daily brief or add a portfolio.
frontend/src/pages/LibraryHistoryPage.ts: Shows library access states based on sign‑in and Pro status, offering sign‑in or upgrade prompts. Actual library content is gated behind a Pro requirement.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioPage.tsx: Displays portfolio health analysis with demo data or user snapshots, allowing asset editing and triggering analysis. Handles sign‑in gating, loading state, and snapshot creation.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Manages user sign‑in and profile settings including email, timezone, and topics. Updates profile via mutations and redirects after saving.
frontend/src/pages/ResearchModePage.tsx: Provides topic‑based research generation and saving using research queries. Lets users select preset topics, create placeholder research, and view saved results.
frontend/src/pages/RootPage.tsx: Redirects signed‑in users to the brief page; otherwise shows the landing page.
frontend/src/pages/TodaysBriefPage.tsx: Renders the Today’s Brief page, loading the latest brief or demo data and allowing users to generate a new brief via mutation.
frontend/src/queries/alertsQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for listing, creating, toggling, and ensuring predefined alert rules via the actor API.
frontend/src/queries/briefQueries.ts: Defines hooks to fetch and sort daily briefs and to create new briefs through actor mutations.
frontend/src/queries/libraryQueries.ts: Fetches briefs, research items, and portfolio snapshots for the library view using actor-backed queries.
frontend/src/queries/portfolioQueries.ts: Exposes hooks for loading portfolio snapshots and mutating assets and snapshots through the actor API.
frontend/src/queries/profileQueries.ts: Loads and updates a user profile based on email using actor queries and mutations.
frontend/src/queries/researchQueries.ts: Manages research item retrieval and creation/saving mutations through React Query.
frontend/src/state/usePrototypeSession.t: Zustand store persisting prototype user email with setters to update or clear it.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config extending colors, typography, animations, and themes for the app’s design system.
project_state.json: Captures the project’s metadata, design notes, known issues, and existing features for the PulseBrief prototype.
